name: Handicapable of killing zombies
description:
The zombie apocalypse has begun, and it's just your luck that the epicentre of the outbreak is right here, at the 2022 World Wheelchair Basketball Championships!

My highest score is 82, can you beat it?

Controls (controller is best!):

  • Controller: right stick to aim, R1 or R2 to shoot, gamepad North to restart
  • KB/M: mouse to aim, space to shoot, R to restart
  • KB only: WASD or arrow keys to aim, space to shoot, R to restart

Made as part of Vimjam 3 while taking a break from working on my blackjack based deckbuilding roguelike Dungeons and Degenerate Gamblers
